channel.title: MBallSectionsDR

item.title: 'You saved my life:' Freed hostage Edan Alexander thanks Trump in emotional phone call

item.title: Is Tribalism Bad?
item.description: Rather than shriek about the human impulse to join a tribe, it’s more productive to explain which tribes are worthy of members.

item.title: Trump tells Walmart to 'eat the tariffs' rather than hike prices
item.description: President Trump demanded that Walmart absorb the cost of his tariffs to avoid hiking prices.

item.title: 'Failure's not an option': Trump budget bill will be 'big' help for seniors, top House tax-writer says
item.description: House Republicans' tax bill will include significant relief for senior citizens, Ways & Means Committee Chairman Jason Smith told Fox News Digital.

item.title: The U.S. Must Get Europe to Pressure Iran, Too
item.description: Rallying Europe around a tougher stance on Iran is a clear, achievable step toward shaping history in the right direction.

item.title: Sargent’s Madame X Is More Than Ready for Her Close-Up
item.description: The Met’s Sargent and Paris show lets us know that the artist’s unique flair stands the test of time.

item.title: From Schumer’s ‘Whirlwind’ Threat To Comey’s ‘8647,’ Assassination Prep Is The Left’s MO

item.title: Missouri Senate Opens The Door To Replace Recently Passed Radical Abortion Amendment
